mapper.select: select id, account_code, file_name, in_time, minio_bucket, minio_path from minio_files where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into minio_files(account_code, file_name, in_time, minio_bucket, minio_path) values (#{accountCode}, #{fileName}, #{inTime}, #{minioBucket}, #{minioPath})

insert into minio_files(account_code, file_name, in_time, minio_bucket, minio_path) values
(#{entity.accountCode}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.minioBucket}, #{entity.minioPath})

insert into minio_files(account_code, file_name, in_time, minio_bucket, minio_path) values
(#{entity.accountCode}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.minioBucket}, #{entity.minioPath})
on duplicate key update account_code = values(account_code), file_name = values(file_name), in_time = values(in_time), minio_bucket = values(minio_bucket), minio_path = values(minio_path)
mapper.update:
update minio_files
account_code = #{accountCode},
file_name = #{fileName},
in_time = #{inTime},
minio_bucket = #{minioBucket},
minio_path = #{minioPath},
where id = #{id}
